LiteLoader 1.8.0
  • Prev Package
  • Next Package
  • Frames
  • No Frames
  • All Classes

Package com.mumfrey.liteloader.launch

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameEnvironment  
    LoaderBootstrap
    Interface for the loader bootstrap, this is loaded in the parent classloader for convenience otherwise it would be necessary to call the initialisation functions using reflection which just gets boring very quickly.
    LoaderEnvironment
    The Loader Environment, contains accessors for getting information about the current Loader session such as the game directories, profile, and API management classes.
    LoaderProperties
    Interface for the object which will manage loader properties (internal and volatile).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassPathUtilities
    Nasty horrible reflection hacks to do nasty things with the classpath
    ClassTransformerManager
    Manages injection of required and optional transformers
    InjectionStrategy
    Encapsulates a strategy for injecting a URL into the classpath
    LiteLoaderTransformer  
    LiteLoaderTweaker
    LiteLoader tweak class
    LiteLoaderTweakerServer  
    NonDelegatingClassLoader
    ClassLoader which only allows whitelisted classes to be loaded, used to pre-load packet transformer classes to ensure that they don't reference any external classes.
    StartupEnvironment
    Container for startup environment state which also parses the command line options.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    InjectionStrategy.InjectionPosition
    Defines a position for a classpath injection strategy
    LoaderEnvironment.EnvironmentType  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidTransformerException
    Exception thrown from the NonDelegatingClassLoader if a transformer tries to access a class outside of the classes that are allowed for that transformer.
